page.title: 13RELIGION IN HIGH WYCOMBE
page.content: A number of religions are represented in High Wycombe. There are eleven {Church of England}churches.{All Saints {Parish Church}is the main church. A few fragments of the early church remain. The shape of the church is in a cross, and this can be clearly seen in the building. Other{Christian}denominations are represented in High Wycombe, such as {Methodists, Baptists, The Society of {Friends, Christian Fellowships,Roman {Catholics, Jehovah's Witnesses, {Christain Scientists}and the {Salvation Army.}Many of these churches worship together on occasions. At Whitsuntide each year there is an open air{rally of Christain Unity. There is also the Mosque for the {Moslem community.}Other religions exist in the town, such as the{Sikhs who meet in a converted house.
